articles.content: 2K’s Borderlands 3 still costs £50. Rockstar’s seven year-old GTA V costs £25. Just some food for thought. Anyways, Take-Two Interactive, the mega corporation who own the likes of 2K and Rockstar, th… [+2557 chars]

articles.author: By Ellie Phillips For Mailonline
articles.title: Love Island winners Paige Turley and Finley Tapp can't hide their happiness while out in Manchester - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Love Island winners were all smiles as they strolled along in athleisure following a quick stop-off for groceries in Manchester, on Friday
articles.content:
They enjoyed a staycation in London ahead of the second lockdown. 
And, Paige Turley, 23, and Finley Tapp, 20, couldn't hide their happiness as they held hands after picking up coffees in Manchester… [+2470 chars]

articles.title: Unicorns: the rarest cars ever sold on UK roads - Autocar
articles.description: A look at all the cars and model derivatives that sold in very small numbers in the first place - which ones have you spotted?
articles.content: Aston Martin reckoned it could sell 2000 Cygnets each year and it was initially bullish enough to say that the car would be available only to existing Aston owners. Then it realised that far from bei… [+323 chars]
